sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [dbo].[source_cars_data] where date_id >
 '@{activity('last_load').output.value[0].last_load}' AND  date_id <= 
'@{activity('current_load').output.value[0].max_date}'

query.value: @concat('select coalesce(cast(max(loaddate) as date),''','1900-01-01',''') as last_fetched_date from audit.load_logs where',' data_source=''',item().datasource,''' and tablename=''',item().tablename,'''')
